3: Looks like we're at the right place. The Central Purification Filter is still running in this city.
Its efficiency is decreasing, but it should still last a few months.
If you weren't bringing a whole group of children, the army would have never guard you on your journey.
Now that you're here, you'll have to take care of yourselves.
I know—That's why we've been taking those kids with us.
Is there a problem?
It's always been us ostracized servants of God who protect and feed the children during warfare.
Of course we're allowed to rely on the charity of you soldier folks in these critical hours.
No, it's just... Saying it so bluntly in your position, it's making me a little... Forget it...
Anyway, the shelter below this church belongs to you now.
But the supplies...
A-achoo! Lucia, I'm cold...
Shh...
W-what's that sound? Is it... a Corrupted?
Come out! Or else—
The black-clad man is about to pull out his gun, but seeing the two small figures in the corner, he quickly returns it.
Lucia, holding Luna's hand, walk slowly out of the darkness.
Where did these two little girls come from...?
Go go go, go somewhere else, this place is already...
Hey!
Tch...
Okay...
Two more mouths to feed it is.
From today onwards, you two'll come with me.
